title: Wadanohara, the Blue Sea Witch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check to see if someone's house has a barrier. If they do, you will fix it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may choose to make your visits Astral or not each night.
-At the start of the game, the town is notified that "The six barriers protect the pristine blue sea...". Then, six random players in the game are selected to have a barrier at their house. If that player gets visited twice OR killed, the barrier is broken.
- Once all six barriers are broken, you have two options:
- Sacrifice yourself
- Become Wadanohara the Blood Sea Witch.
- If you sacrifice yourself, you will suicide out of guilt and if the game ends in a good faction Victory, then you will also win the game regardless of win condition fullfillment.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.

desc:
Post 4
*My dear girl. Please remain who you are. Let nothing stain you, let nothing take you away. That is all I ask of you.*
